name: Mirror (itch) (Bit Byte Bear)
description:
This game was made for Meditations, a launcher that serves one minigame per day. More information on http://meditations.games/

Big thanks to Will Helliwell for letting us use his song Watermark in the game.

This is the description included in the Meditations launcher:

For many years I've had a love/hate relationship with my mirror, and it took me a long time to accept all my imperfections, maybe I was just not "my type". 

But as the years passed I have learned to accept this skin I live in with all its good things and bad things, and the more I was feeling comfortable with my skin, the more I was feeling happy to share my love with someone else.

Bonus: There's a little easter egg if you play more than once.

P.S: The game is shared as is. It's a small free project, and as such we can't give support or updates for it. Sorry about that!
